fr.upmc.components.registry

Class ConnectionData

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.registry.ConnectionData

  • public class ConnectionData
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ConnectionData represents the data stored by the reqistry to know for each port on which host the port is published on the RMI registry.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2012-10-22

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String hostname
      host running the RMI registry on which the port is published.
      protected int port
      port number on which the RMI registry can be called.
      protected ConnectionType type
      RMI, socket, (to be implemented), others ??

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionData(ConnectionType type, java.lang.String hostname, int port)
      create a connection data object from the information received by the registry through a socket communication (hence strings).
      ConnectionData(java.lang.String value)
      create a connection data object from the raw information received by the registry through a socket communication (hence one string).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionData

        public ConnectionData(ConnectionType type,
              java.lang.String hostname,
              int port)
        create a connection data object from the information received by the registry through a socket communication (hence strings).

        Contract

         pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        type - type of connection
        hostname - name of the host on which RMI registry the port is published.
        port - port number of the RMI registry.

      • ConnectionData

        public ConnectionData(java.lang.String value)
        create a connection data object from the raw information received by the registry through a socket communication (hence one string).

        Contract

         pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        value - string containing the information about the publised port.
